name: ci_cd_test_integration
description: Continuous Integration test execution and reporting

args: echo 'name: Test Suite' > /tmp/workflow.yml; echo 'on: [push, pull_request]' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo 'jobs:' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo '  test:' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo '    runs-on: ubuntu-latest' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo '    steps:' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo '      - uses: actions/checkout@v3' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo '      - name: Run tests' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; echo '        run: pytest tests/' >> /tmp/workflow.yml; cat /tmp/workflow.yml; echo ''; echo 'GitHub Actions workflow created'

name: Test Suite
on: [push, pull_request]
jobs:
